document_data.name: Benzoate Glycol
document_data.mainbody: '''Benzoate Glycol''' was a rather dimwitted and extremely handsome [[adventurer]] in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite organized play/LC/The Call of the Wilde/Round One|13}}
document_data.Activities: Over his years of adventuring, Benzoate acquired membership in the city of Ravens Bluff's [[Clerical Circle]], its [[Wizards' Guild]], its [[Fellowship of Bards, Performers and Artists|Bards' Guild]], its [[Ravens Bluff Navy|Navy]], and its [[knight]]ly order the [[Golden Roosters]].{{Cite organized play/LC/Cloaks and Daggers|39}}
